TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Clock extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 维护 的运行时时序状态。

span.span: Maintains run-time timing state for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本身并不实际执行任何操作,而不是描述段时间。A , by itself, doesn't actually do anything other than describe a segment of time. 它是执行实际工作的时间线对象: 它为时间线维护与计时相关的运行时状态。It's the timeline's object that does the real work: it maintains timing-related run-time state for the timeline. 在大多数情况下, 时钟会自动为时间线创建。In most cases, a clock is created automatically for your timeline. 使用或方法对进行动画处理时, 会自动为时间线和动画创建时钟, 并将其应用于其目标属性。When you animate by using a or the method, clocks are automatically created for your timelines and animations and applied to their targeted properties. 相关示例，请参阅[如何：使用情节提要](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md)对属性进行动画处理[, 以及如何:在不使用情节提要](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md)的情况下对属性进行动画处理。For examples, see [How to: Animate a Property by Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md) and [How to: Animate a Property Without Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md). 你还可以使用方法显式创建。You can also create a explicitly by using the method. 在性能密集型方案 (如对大量类似对象进行动画处理) 中, 管理自己的使用可以提供性能优势。In performance-intensive scenarios, such as animating large numbers of similar objects, managing your own use can provide performance benefits. 时钟安排在与从中创建它们的对象树的结构相匹配的树中。Clocks are arranged in trees that match the structure of the objects tree from which they are created. 此类计时树的根时钟可以通过检索其来以交互方式 (暂停、恢复、停止等) 进行操作。The root clock of such a timing tree can be interactively manipulated (paused, resumed, stopped, and so on) by retrieving its . 非根时钟无法直接控制。Non-root clocks cannot be directly controlled. 创建后, 无法修改时钟 (但可以对其进行操作)。Once created, a clock cannot be modified (but it can be manipulated). ## 使用时间线作为计时器Using a Timeline as a Timer 仅当存在与其相关联的事件处理程序时, 或 (在对象的情况下) 与属性相关联的事件处理程序时, 时间线的时钟才会进行。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 出于此原因 (以及其他), 不建议使用作为计时器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

para.span: 如果派生类要修改此时钟的时间流, 则应实现。

span.span: Derived classes should implement if they want to modify how time flows for this clock.

para.span: 派生类可以通过重写、 和方法, 在时钟重复、跳过、查找、启动、暂停、恢复或停止时执行额外的工作。

span.span: Derived classes can be made to do additional work when the clock repeats, skips, seeks, begins, pauses, resumes, or stops by overriding the , , and methods.

param.name: timeline

span.span: The from which this clock should be constructed.

param.span: 将不再为任何已具有时钟的子 对象创建时钟。

span.span: Clocks are not created for any child objects, if they exist.

summary.span: 使用指定的 作为模板来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified as a template.

summary.span: 新的 对象没有子级。

span.span: The new object has no children.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: 当此时钟完全播放完毕时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this clock has completely finished playing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此时钟为时钟树的根时钟, 则它在到达其活动持续时间 (包括重复) 结束后已完成播放, 其所有子项已到达其活动持续时间的终点。If this clock is the root clock of a clock tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active duration (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active durations. 如果此时钟为子时钟, 则当其所属的时钟树的根时钟到达其活动持续时间的终点并且其所有子时钟已完成播放时, 将被视为已完全完成播放。If this clock is a child clock, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root clock of the clock tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active duration and all its child clocks have finished playing. 停止时钟不会触发其已完成的事件, 而是将其前进到填充期。Stopping a clock does not trigger its completed event, but advancing it to its fill period does.

span.span: Gets a that can be used to start, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, or remove this .

value.span: 如果这是根时钟，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A if this is a root clock; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能以交互方式控制根时钟。Only root clocks can be interactively controlled.

span.span: The rate at which this clock's time is current progressing, compared to real-world time.

value.span: 如果该时钟已停止，则此属性返回 。

span.span: If the clock is stopped, this property returns .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在更新时钟速度时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock's speed is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用触发此事件, 暂停、继续、反转、加速、减速、查找、停止或更改时钟的交互速度。Pausing, resuming, reversing, accelerating, decelerating, seeking, stopping, or changing a clock's interactive speed using a triggers this event. 尽管此事件在属性变为无效时发生, 但并不一定表示属性已更改。Although this event occurs when the property becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the property changed.

span.span: Gets the current global time, as established by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] timing system.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 计时系统的当前全局时间。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentIteration As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> CurrentIteration { Nullable<int> get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取此时钟的当前迭代。

span.span: Get the current iteration of this clock.

value.span: 此时钟在其当前活动期中的当前迭代，如果此时钟已停止，则为 。

span.span: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or if this clock is stopped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时钟的第一个迭代的值为1。A clock's first iteration has a value of 1. 如果此时钟的时间线的设置为`true`, 则完整迭代包含正向反向对, 而不只是这些段中的一个。If this clock's timeline has an setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments. 无论其当前迭代如何, 查找时钟都会将其当前迭代返回1。Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1. 重新启动时钟还会将其当前迭代返回1。Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentProgress As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> CurrentProgress { Nullable<double> get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取此 在其当前迭代中的当前进度。

span.span: Gets the current progress of this within its current iteration.

value.span: 如果此时钟为 ，则为 ；如果此时钟处于活动状态并且其 具有 的 ，则为 0.0；否则为一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值，该值表示此时钟在其当前迭代中的当前进度。

span.span: if this clock is , or 0.0 if this clock is active and its has a of ; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this Clock within its current iteration.

value.span: 值为 0.0 时表示没有进度，值为 1.0 时表示此时钟处于其当前迭代的末尾。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值指示此时钟的的规范化 。The value of this property indicates the normalized by the of this clock's . 的时钟的类型 为1.0。A clock that is has a of 1.0. ## 使用时间线作为计时器Using a Timeline as a Timer 仅当存在与其相关联的事件处理程序时, 或 (在对象的情况下) 与属性相关联的事件处理程序时, 时间线的时钟才会进行。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 出于此原因 (以及其他), 不建议使用作为计时器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意, 时钟的属性不会告诉您它是否已暂停。Note the clock's property doesn't tell you whether it's paused. 若要确定时钟是否暂停, 请使用属性。To determine whether a clock is paused, use the property. 每当此属性的值发生更改时, 就会发生。The occurs whenever the value of this property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 当更新时钟的 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock's property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在时钟开始、停止或填充时收到通知, 请使用事件。Use the event when you want to be notified if when the clock starts, stops, or fills. 事件处理程序的参数是其状态无效的。 The parameter of the event handler is the whose state was invalidated. 暂停不会更改其。 Pausing a does not change its . 若要在时钟暂停时得到通知, 请使用事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 尽管在变为无效时发生此事件, 但这并不一定意味着已更改 : 从相同的时钟切换到然后再返回到的将导致此事件将触发, 但其属性不会实际更改。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change.
